hesml.benchmarks.impl

Class AbstractBenchmark

  • java.lang.Object
    • hesml.benchmarks.impl.AbstractBenchmark
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ISimilarityBenchmark
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    WordNetSimBenchmark

    abstract class AbstractBenchmark
extends java.lang.Object
implements ISimilarityBenchmark
    This class defines a collection of common functions for all the similarity benchmarks.
    Author:

      • getOutputMetricsMatrix

        protected java.lang.String[][] getOutputMetricsMatrix(SimilarityMeasureType[] measureTypes,
                                                      java.lang.String[] strICModels)
        This function create a blank experiment matrix in order to record the correlation values reported for the cross-validation of multiple measures versus multiple IC-based measures. The number of columns depends on the number of output metrics specified by the client code.
        Parameters:
        measureTypes - Vector with the types of similarity measures to be evaluated.
        strICModels - Names of the IC models to be evaluated.
        Returns:
        A blank matrix to record the results of a similarity benchmark.

      • getOutputMetricsMatrix

        protected java.lang.String[][] getOutputMetricsMatrix(SimilarityMeasureType[] measureTypes,
                                                      ITaxonomyInfoConfigurator[] icModels)
        This function creates the experiment matrix to save the results for multiple measures versus multiple IC-based measures. The number of columns depends on the number of output metrics specified by the client code.
        Parameters:
        measureTypes - Vector with the types of similarity measures to be evaluated.
        icModels - Vector of IC models to be evaluated.
        Returns:

      • getOutputMetricsMatrix

        protected java.lang.String[][] getOutputMetricsMatrix(SimilarityMeasureType[] measureTypes,
                                                      IntrinsicICModelType[] icModels)
        This function create the experiment matrix to save the results for multiple measures versus multiple IC-based measures. The number of columns depends on the number of output metrics specified by the client code.
        Parameters:
        measureTypes - Vector with the types of similarity measures to be evaluated.
        icModels - Type vector with the intrinsic IC models to be evaluated.
        Returns:

      • getOutputMetricsMatrix

        protected java.lang.String[][] getOutputMetricsMatrix(ISimilarityMeasure[] measures)
        This function create the experiment matrix to save the results for multiple non IC-based measures.
        Parameters:
        measures - Vector with the measures to be evaluated
        Returns:
        Blank experiment matrix
